reviews.review: Perhaps the completion to 10 years of MCU could have been better in major aspects , but it's not disappointing. But the conclusion makes us wait a lot for the next. It satisfies, but not all.

Is this a bad film? no. Is this a marvel film? yes. to clarify, its almost like marvel has created its own category of quality. thiere is bad, good and marvel. To elaborate, this movie has the same feel, style, colour as pretty much every other movie. It has a faster pace, but they needed this to squeeze in all the characters. the reality is that the plot is established previously, simple in nature and so we move on to the spectacle. my issues are more with some of the choices made for character. A bested Thor, and easily defeated Hulk- the two most poerful avengers, taken out in the first 10 minutes. Thor spends the whole movie undoing everything from Tho3 where he learnt he didnt require a weapon, in fashioning a brand new weapon. hulk, is now scared.. all so we could spend more time with iron man, iron man who does magic and iron spider.  asides from these points, I found the action to be overwhelming yet no impactful at all. the tracking shots that whedon produced.. there was nothing like this. its just a lot of bright lights. This for all intents and purposes, is a CGI movie. the issue is that the CGI, just looks like CGI. for all the praise people give Thanos' look- you neve think this is an actual person. you always aware its just a purple hulk. They would have done better by using a mix of cgi, prosthetics and real like stand ins. Im sure im in the minority, but I wont automatically love a movie because it is marvel. finally, the shaky cam.. the cheapest most awful thing to happen to cinema since 3D. overused and awful by the Russos- as it was in winter solider and civil war. this could have been the greatest action movie ever. instead its a 'marvel' movie.
Full climax for the 10-year old MCU. It might not be the complete movie, but as an MCU event, the culmination of everything that happened leads us to this, it's well done.
hey marvel....grow up and make a good movie please!
Best of the avengers movies so far.
Why haven't you seen this 3 or 4 times yet?
A must see of the franchise, but it hurts.
Culminating a series of 17 films is hard but these guys nailed it. An overall epic cinematic experience.
EXCELLENT movie loved it from beginning to end the russos made a MASTERPIECE this is more than just a movie
Infinity War is a beautifully shot movie with a very amazing cast and an outstanding villain. My only disappointment is The Black Order, they were useless.
